name: Stoned Ape
description:
Help a little Monkey escape his bad Trip!

WARNING: THIS GAME MAY POTENTIALLY TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY!

THIS GAME CAN CAUSE MOTION SICKNESS, IF SO WE ARE REALLY SORRY :(

This Game was a first collaboration of two Friends, who wanted to make a Game, synchronized to Music and Sound. This "Game" is a Tech-Demo and contains Bugs!

Known Bugs:

  • De-Synchronization on first load: If you encounter Stuttering in the Intro of the Level, the Music may desync to the Gameplay -> ESC and restart the Level
  • Dedicated Graphics Card is needed. On integrated Graphics you may encounter Visual Glitches!

Do you want to check out more?
https://www.pandamiac-studios.com/
